author: Raazia
text:
She's the granddaughter of Muhammad Al Mustafa. 
She's the granddaughter of Khadija Al Kubra. 
She's the daughter of Ali Al Murtaza. 
She's the daughter of Fatima Al Zahra. 
Her brothers are Hassan, Hussain and Abbas. 

She's Zaynab Bint Ali! 🙏🏻💕

author: Raazia
text:
She witnessed the burial of her four years old thirty niece. 
She witnessed so much, but, yet She saw nothing but BEAUTY.

author: Raazia
text:
She witnessed the broken ribs of her Mother.
She witnessed the loneliness of her Father.
She witnessed the barbaric slaughter of her Brothers and Sons. 
She was mercilessly bounded in ropes, paraded on the streets of shaam and imprisoned in the darkest of dungeons.
